name: NO.FACTORY
description:
NO.FACTORY1—no water
NO.FACTORY2—this game is stupid
NO.FACTORY3—container*

*available now.

NO.FACTORY is a series of oblique, dynamic portraits - submerged architectures of our former digital selves.

Taking Viktor Shklyovsky’s THIRD FACTORY as its basis—the factories of our life-stages that produced, refined, and homogenised us—NO.FACTORY belongs to the near infinite no-longer-productive sites of our past; dead, non-factories whose tools and machines have been stripped away. We can walk into their ruins, but we cannot bring them back to into production.
